meanings.definition: Levants: to leave secretly or hurriedly
meanings.sent1: She levants from the party before anyone noticed.
meanings.sent2: He always levants from work early on Fridays.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel levants with the nut, trying to avoid the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The wind levants through the trees, carrying the fallen leaves with it.
meanings.sent5: The thief levants into the night, disappearing without a trace.

meanings.definition: Levants: a person who leaves secretly or hurriedly
meanings.sent1: The levants slipped away from the scene without being seen.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the office levants, always disappearing when things got tough.
meanings.sent3: The levants at the magic show vanished in a puff of smoke.
meanings.sent4: The levants in the spy movie were experts at disappearing without a trace.
meanings.sent5: The levants in the story were like shadows, always gone before anyone could catch them.
